definition.en:
A public key property is used to specify a URL that contains information about a public key.
see [The Security Vocabulary](https://w3c-ccg.github.io/security-vocab/#publicKey) or [mastodon usage documentation](https://docs.joinmastodon.org/spec/security/)
definition.de:
Ein öffentlicher Schlüssel spezifiziert eine URL, die Infos zum public key enthält.
siehe [The Security Vocabulary](https://w3c-ccg.github.io/security-vocab/#publicKey) or [mastodon usage documentation](https://docs.joinmastodon.org/spec/security/)
definition.fr:
Une propriété de clé publique est utilisée pour spécifier une URL qui contient des informations sur une clé publique.
voir [The Security Vocabulary](https://w3c-ccg.github.io/security-vocab/#publicKey) or [mastodon usage documentation](https://docs.joinmastodon.org/spec/security/)
definition.es:
Una propiedad de clave pública se utiliza para especificar una URL que contiene información sobre una clave pública.
ver [The Security Vocabulary](https://w3c-ccg.github.io/security-vocab/#publicKey) or [mastodon usage documentation](https://docs.joinmastodon.org/spec/security/)

example.en:
```json 
The following example demonstrates the expression of a public key belonging to the identity https://payswarm.example.com/i/bob.
{
  "@context": "https://w3id.org/security/v1",
  "@id": "https://payswarm.example.com/i/bob/keys/1",
  "@type": "Key",
  "owner": "https://payswarm.example.com/i/bob",
  "publicKeyPem": "-----BEGIN PUBLIC KEY-----
MII8YbF3s8q3c...j8Fk88FsRa3K
-----END PUBLIC KEY-----
"
}```
example.de:
```json 
Das folgende Beispiel demonstriert den Ausdruck eines öffentlichen Schlüssels zugehörig zur Identität https://payswarm.example.com/i/bob.
{
  "@context": "https://w3id.org/security/v1",
  "@id": "https://payswarm.example.com/i/bob/keys/1",
  "@type": "Key",
  "owner": "https://payswarm.example.com/i/bob",
  "publicKeyPem": "-----BEGIN PUBLIC KEY-----
MII8YbF3s8q3c...j8Fk88FsRa3K
-----END PUBLIC KEY-----
"
}```
example.fr:
```json 
L'exemple suivant montre l'expression d'une clé publique appartenant à l'identité https://payswarm.example.com/i/bob.
{
  "@context": "https://w3id.org/security/v1",
  "@id": "https://payswarm.example.com/i/bob/keys/1",
  "@type": "Key",
  "owner": "https://payswarm.example.com/i/bob",
  "publicKeyPem": "-----BEGIN PUBLIC KEY-----
MII8YbF3s8q3c...j8Fk88FsRa3K
-----END PUBLIC KEY-----
"
}```
example.es:
```json 
El siguiente ejemplo muestra la expresión de una clave pública perteneciente a la identidad https://payswarm.example.com/i/bob.
{
  "@context": "https://w3id.org/security/v1",
  "@id": "https://payswarm.example.com/i/bob/keys/1",
  "@type": "Key",
  "owner": "https://payswarm.example.com/i/bob",
  "publicKeyPem": "-----BEGIN PUBLIC KEY-----
MII8YbF3s8q3c...j8Fk88FsRa3K
-----END PUBLIC KEY-----
"
}```
